actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

official_title: To withdraw certain land in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010

summary.text: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010 - Reserves for 20 years certain federal land for use by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) for the Federal Law Enforcement Training Center in Eddy County, New Mexico.

titles.title: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010
To withdraw certain land in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
